title: Nossa Senhora do descanso (Capela de)
body: With this invocation, there was a chapel in the parish of Santa Luzia, on the property still known today by the name of Quinta do Descanso. It belonged to the entail of Trist찾o Bettencourt da C창mara, but we do not know the time it was built.

Santa Luzia: Parish on the Island of Madeira

Trist찾o Bettencourt da C창mara: Owner of the entail where the chapel was located.
